ayahs.text: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ إِنَّآ أَنزَلْنَٰهُ فِى لَيْلَةِ ٱلْقَدْرِ
ayahs.translation: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?

ayahs.text: لَيْلَةُ ٱلْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌۭ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍۢ
ayahs.translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

ayahs.text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍۢ
ayahs.translation: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
